attributes.action: Instruct H.M. Revenue and Customs to scrap late payment fines, interest and surcharges to small businesses whilst the country is in a credit crunch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LATEPAYMENTFEE/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
